abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would provide: (a)
            about 2,500 km of stock routes, 48 primary and 6 terminal
            markets, with limited trucking services connecting the three
            main cattle producing areas of the country with the main
            centers of consumption; (b) about 159 slaughter facilities
            with associated hide sheds situated throughout the country;
            (c) technical and administrative assistance, including
            training of LMB staff; (d) employment of a Ranching
            Specialist to be seconded to LMB; and (e) funds for the
            preparation of future livestock projects.

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would provide: (a)
            about 2,500 km of stock routes, 48 primary and 6 terminal
            markets, with limited trucking services connecting the three
            main cattle producing areas of the country with the main
            centers of consumption; (b) about 159 slaughter facilities
            with associated hide sheds situated throughout the country;
            (c) technical and administrative assistance, including
            training of LMB staff; (d) employment of a Ranching
            Specialist to be seconded to LMB; and (e) funds for the
            preparation of future livestock projects.
